definition: To enhance or refine something, typically used when describing the process of improving the quality, taste, or appearance of food, beverages, or other products.

examples.english: I want to refine my cooking recipe.

examples.german: Der Koch versucht, den Geschmack des Gerichts zu verfeinern.
examples.english: The chef is trying to enhance the flavor of the dish.

examples.german: Sie hat ihre Sprachkenntnisse durch regelmäßiges Üben verfeinert.
examples.english: She has refined her language skills through regular practice.

examples.german: Das Unternehmen plant, seine Produkte weiter zu verfeinern.
examples.english: The company plans to further refine its products.

examples.german: Er hat seine Technik im Laufe der Jahre verfeinert.
examples.english: He has refined his technique over the years.
